mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarms (member_id, category, content, redirect_url, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{category}, #{content}, #{redirectUrl}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alarms WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_read = 0 AND created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alarms WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_read = 'N'
